Association.definition: a group of persons who share common interests or a common purpose and who are organized with varying degrees of formality compare corporation 2

1.definition: a group of persons who share common interests or a common purpose and who are organized with varying degrees of formality compare

2.definition: the act of having contact or communication with or keeping company with another [freedom of ]

3.definition: the sharing (as by an aider and abettor) in the criminal intent of a person who commits a crime
